title: How to Kidnap the Sandy Claws
body: Kidnap Mr. Sandy Claws! I wanna do it. Let's draw straws. Jack said, 'We should work together.' Three of a kind, birds of a feather now and forever! Wheeee! (La, la, la, la, la, la...

title: Falling Apart at the Seams
body: It's not easy being a franken-creature. Loose stitches, the stares people give you.  It can all be a little much.

title: Dog Days of Death
body: Ghost dogs are the best!  Better than hot dogs, better than cats, you name it.  Eternal rest, love from the residents of Halloween Town, and other such perks can't be beat!
